users.name: All Users
users.description: Retrieve all users with their roles and creation dates
users.sql: SELECT id, username, email, role, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC

users.name: Recent Users
users.description: Users created in the last N days
users.sql: SELECT id, username, email, role, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '{days} days' ORDER BY created_at DESC

users.name: Users by Role
users.sql: SELECT id, username, email, role, created_at FROM users WHERE role = '{role}' ORDER BY username

users.name: User Count by Role
users.description: Count of users grouped by role
users.sql: SELECT role, COUNT(*) as user_count FROM users GROUP BY role ORDER BY user_count DESC

products.name: All Products
products.description: Retrieve all products with their details
products.sql: SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY name

products.name: Products by Category
products.sql: SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = '{category}' ORDER BY price DESC

products.name: Products in Price Range
products.sql: SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN {min_price} AND {max_price} ORDER BY price

products.name: Most Expensive Products
products.sql: SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT {limit}

products.name: Category Statistics
products.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as product_count, AVG(price) as avg_price, MIN(price) as min_price, MAX(price) as max_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY product_count DESC

products.name: Search Products
products.sql: SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE LOWER(name) LIKE LOWER('%{search_term}%') ORDER BY name
